item.title: Super Robot Wars Y ‘DLC #2: Awakening of a Soul’ launches February 6
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Version 1.2.0 update due out on February 3.

The Super Robot Wars Y version 1.2.0 update will launch on February 3, followed by the paid “Downloadable Content #2: Awakening of a Soul” on February 6, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Bandai Namco Forge Digitals announced. Early access for the downloadable content will begin on February 4.

Here is an overview of the new content:

  • Version 1.2.0 Update
    • Special Mission: “Battle Rush 2” added
    • Various Status Cap Unlock
    • Downloadable Content #2 Area Mission #1:” Omen”
    • Expanded STG Memory
    • Other stability improvements
  • “Downloadable Content #1: Contract from the Darkness”
    • Five new playable units
    • 16 new Area Missions
    • 10 new Onboard Missions
    • One new Assist Crew members
    • Featured series:
      • Steel Jeeg (Kotetsu Jeeg)
      • Getter Robot: The Jet-Black Drifters (Dynamic Planning Original)
      • The Brave Fighter of Legend Da-Garn

Super Robot Wars Y is available now for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

“DLC #2: Awakening of a Soul” Release Date Trailer
